snippet: Expect the Falcons to do what the Cowboys should have done Sunday night: control the tempo with no-huddle and mitigate the Giants' pass rush with quick-hitting plays.
abstract: Expect the Falcons to do what the Cowboys should have done Sunday night: control the tempo with no-huddle and mitigate the Giants' pass rush with quick-hitting plays.
lead_paragraph: Andy Benoit, who has been contributing weekly film reviews this season, trains his eye on the wild-card matchups:

headline.main: Wild-Card Games: What the Film Says
